tool_description: Unofficial API for scraping Free Games Offers from the Epic Games Store
name: Epic Games Store - Free Games
title: Epic Games Store - Free Games

api_list.name: Free Games
api_list.description: Return All Free Games on Offer on the Epic Games Store. Also returns upcoming Free Games.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country Code for local offers. E.g, ES, DE, US. Defaults to US
